fnss.topologies.simplemodels.star_topology¶

star_topology(n)[source]¶

Return a star (a.k.a hub-and-spoke) topology of nodes

The root (hub) node has id 0 while all leaf (spoke) nodes have id .

Each node has the attribute type which can either be root (for node 0) or leaf for all other nodes

Parameters:

n : int

The number of leaf nodes
Returns:

topology : A Topology object
